tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart
type: Adding Charts - Looking for a quick fix?

definition.text: If you are less interested in a custom chart and just want a quick way to see your the Trading System in action. Follow these steps.

paragraphs.text: Backup your Backtesting Session and Live Trading Session Parameters.
Uninstall the Market so everything gets cleaned.
Backup your Trading System and then restore it.
Install the market again. The installation process will detect two trading systems at the Workspace and automatically create the Trading Tasks and Charts you need.
Restore your Session Parameters and replace the auto generated ones.
Now you should have a nice basic setup. Click next to see some real magic!
